phrases: That you lied to other countries about peace through neutrality
and developed grave threats, the Valvraves, in secret.
Do you have anything to say in your defense,
Prime Minister of Old JIOR, Sashinami Ryuji?
It is delicious, you have got to try it!
For that way of eating them.
For that way of eating them.
I will treat you when we get to the Moon, then.
On the Moon, I can get all the ingredients I mentioned.
Plus, the Moon is neutral territory.
The Dorssians will not be able to attack us anymore.
The war will be over, too!
We will go back to being ordinary students and focus on club activities.
We will have proper classes, too!
On Saturdays, we will all go hang out together,
and everything that was called off, we will start up again.
Once we get to the Moon, I know everything will be okay!
You are the one who asked me to meet you!
We were supposed to meet at 10, right?
Me getting here first is the same as you keeping me waiting.
The reason I asked to meet you is
You are planning to talk on the sidewalk?
Unit 3 or whatever is lame, you know?
Okay, it looks like this will let you fight for extended periods.
He left for the photo shoot.
Me, a minister, can you believe it?
Minister of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism: Juto Bansho
So sorry, my good Minister of Land Transport.
Minister for Foreign Affairs: Takahi Ninomiya
Is not that dress a bit daring?
I have to dress the part in order to associate with foreign countries.
Minister of Health and Welfare: Rion Nanami
No, Tokishima and Miss Rukino are not here yet, and neither is
The me in medamayaki is a drawing of an eye!
Me = eye; Medamayaki = sunny-side-up fried eggs.
The egg for sunny-side-up is a manga eye!
Minister for Internal Affairs and Communications: Marie Nobi
If you want, we can all wear this shirt so we mat
We said we would talk after we got there.
The one with the blue sign!
But that is a place that serves alcohol!
We can just change the stupid law!
Flip this switch to the left...
But these are the only switches...
I refuse to let you apologize to me.
That is weird, he is not picking up.
Miss Rukino is not here, either.
Wait, you do not think they are together, do you?
No, it is from another address.
Why is my little sister calling you?
I will take care of anything she needs done outside, so I will thank you to butt out.
Oh, you have a little sister?
Takahi, this is a personal matter!
No way it is Shoko's phone.
This is Rion Nanami the Health and Phys-Ed teacher.
I-It is nice to meet you!
I-I am on the student council with your brother!
We were all here taking the cabinet photo.
Why do not you come join us?
The outside world is a lot of fun!
You will make lots of new friends, too!
You can eat cake with them go swimming with them!
It is for your own good, Akira-chan.
You need to experience the outside world more.
I have been alone my whole life.
Because no one ever chose me.
Not my family, not my friends.
You were a huge pop star, and were even in movies!
I am all alone, so if I could be alone with someone else, that would be enough.
I have been alone my whole life.
Because no one ever chose me.
Not my family not my friends.
I did this movie two years ago, and I still remember my lines!
Turns out that I had a knack for acting, too!
You are not alone, not anymore.
All personnel, please go to level 1 battle alert!
They are between Module 77 and the Moon!
We will never reach the Moon without punching our way through them!
We will have to do just that.
Watch team, report to the radar room!
Air defense gun turrets will be set to debris shredding mode for this operation only.
It is unlike you to commit such a blunder, Capt.
According to your report, those Valvraves have a limit to how long they can remain operational.
If we press them en masse
All we have to do is engage them in a protracted battle and exhaust them.
Module 77 is changing course to a heading of 741!
We will not let them get away.
All ships to maximum combat speed!
Concentrate barrier system on our side facing the Moon.
There is just too many of them!
We cannot take much more of this!
I have factored everything into my calculations.
The enemy fleet has utterly broken their formation in order to pursue Module 77.
They are in a line now!
In this formation, you can wipe them all out at once with your Harakiri Blade.
So that is why you ordered the course change!
It was not to run away!
Blade is the key to turning the tables.
If you miss your chance, this operation will end in failure.
I have written out what will happen at each stage of the remainder of the operation.
Give the orders as written here.
When it comes to talent for carrying out instructions written in a manual, you are the best there is.
You sound like you are going somewhere.
They want to speak with the Prime Minister!
But in the Prime Minister's official residence.
You are the prime minister of a country.
I insist that you make the minimum effort to look the part.
It is my turn this time.
Until we got swept up in this war, I had no idea.
I never knew how incredibly lucky we were to live in peace.
So I got to thinking that our peace did not come free, and it is something that someone protected for us.
So now it is my turn to protect it.
A state's ultimate duty is the safety of its citizens.
That is what Dorssia thought, too.
As a result, they keep a massive military.
Shoko Sashinami, Prime Minister of JIOR.
This is a time of war.
I will dispense with the empty formalities.
The verdict of former JIOR Prime Minister Ryuji Sashinami's military tribunal was death.
I thought we told you that if you laid a hand on our families, we would hand over the Valvraves to ARUS!
Prepare to carry out the execution.
To adults, that is a compliment.
Worrying about methods and aesthetics is a childish affectation.
Using any means, however dirty, to achieve one's objective is what an adult does.
You and me, we are going to blow these guys to hell!
Victory glosses over any cowardice, any injustice.
I have pinpointed the enemy's location.
The heart of the enemy fleet.
It is within the Harakiri Blade's firing range.
Haruto, my father is over there.
If we let this chance pass us by, we will be defeated.
I knew that you would be coming at me from the left!
The battle is playing out exactly as L-elf wrote.
Let us make a deal, my young Prime Minister.
In exchange for the transfer of the Valvraves...
I will allow all of you students and your families to take asylum in a third-party country.
What about the other citizens of JIOR?
They are only the same race as you.
The vast majority are total strangers.
We will never make a deal to save only ourselves!
It is a sad thing, being alone...
That is more than enough to be happy.
You should leave the fighting to adults.
You do not want your friends to die, do you?
You are the new prime minister huh?
The condemned is not permitted to make an statements!
What harm can it do for us to talk a little?
After all, this is a father's last conversation with his daughter.
Do not give up so easily!
I will save you, you hear me?!
Their line is starting to scatter...
How much longer for the Harakiri Blade?
It is an adult's job to return to the earth to make new flowers grow...
Shut your mouth, you damn JIORan!
Your future does not lie behind you!
Do not make me laugh, weakling!
We can reach the Moon now!
Did ya see that, you Dorssian bastards?!
Charge through the hole we have opened in their middle and make for the Moon!
Everything went according to your plan, L-elf.
How far ahead can you see?
Object closing in at high speed from below!
The Valvraves cannot get back in!
We cannot cool them off now, either!
What are we going to do?!
We are being boarded by the enemy!
There is nothing about this written in here, damn it!
We will just pull the damn thing out, then!
We are going to settle things once and for all.
Miss Rukino, take me back to Module 77!
I will fight them hand to hand!
Now sealing all bulkheads below level BEFORE!
I repeat, now sealing all bulkheads below level BEFORE!
Annihilate the enemy after luring them into position.
I am happy to see you following my training so scrupulously.
However, that makes you easy to predict.
I will come back when my Valvrave has cooled off!
Do your best to rescue Shoko.
Idiot, what do you think you are doing?!
I have been thinking about what will happen after this battle is over.
Next time, episode 12, The Heretic Activates”.
The system that will expose the truth of the world.
